message: I run as fast as I can through the alleys, trying to get away.
It doesn't take long for me to notice the sound of footsteps following me.
The footsteps are drawing closer fast. I try to speed up, but I can't put any distance between us.
Instead of a cop, it turns out to be Noiz.
I've been running really hard, too, but he isn't even out of breath.
He wouldn't have been my first choice... but it's better than being alone.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm running from the cops, not you!"
He was running ahead of me, so I have to react quickly to avoid smashing into him.

Suddenly, it feels like the ground gives out beneath my feet.

Wait, isn't this...?!
